header.title: Syntax Highlighter 3 phpbb3 1.1.3
header.description:
This is a very simple,stable, fully working Syntax 3 highlighter mod for phpbb3 based on Syntax Highlighter 3 by Alex Gorbatchev. It uses javascript to prettify code used in a custom bbcode.
42 brushes included using autoloader to dynamically load brushes as and when they are called instead of permanently embedded in the page source .
works with automod on a phpbb3 3.0.10 and should be pretty much update proof and backward compatible with older versions since there are only two edits/adds and no core files are touched.
a note of credit has top g out to Sniper_E and this post http://www.rmcgirr83.org/viewtopic.php?f=5&t=1575. the really cool and functional drop down menu is a modified version of this.
header.author-notes:
once the mod is installed you need to add a new bbcode !!! BUT you do NOT have to display it on the posting page since there will be a drop down menu. !!! USAGE [code2={SIMPLETEXT}]{TEXT}[/code2] HTML Replace

{SIMPLETEXT} code

{TEXT}
HELPLINE [code2={required brush without brackets such as html}]some code[/code2] so it looks like [code2=html][/code2] USE THE DROP DOWN MENU or if you want to use the bbcode you need to specify a language for each calling of the bbcode by doing this [code2=html]some html code goes here[/code2] or [code2=php]some php code goes here [/code2] so when you call the bbcode you will get this [code2=][/code2] what you do is put your codes between the tags then tell it what type of code is there by doing this [code2=html]some code[/code2] The Brushes are dynamically loaded according to what is called through the bbcodes, meaning the xml,html brush is only loaded if you someone loads a page that is using the [code2=html][/code2] bbcode Please see the contrib/syntax.txt for a detailed list of supported languages and usable aliases please visit the FAQ for this mod for other info and tweaks http://www.phpbb.com/customise/db/mod/syntax_highlighter_3_using_autoloader/faq/ all files included use the MIT / GPL v2 license

fixed script ahead of mod submission

cdata on script, improved description and help, moved readme to contrib.
added a drop down menu for syntax selction.
re wrote the auto loader script to be less verbose. added regex script
fixed problems with the coffescript,masm2 and powershgell brushes loading.
